casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Neil Wayne HOYLE 239A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 3, 2018 Ms. Anne Bleyman, Attorney at Law, for Hoyle, Neil Wayne Ms. Tiffany Y. Lucas, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina Mr. David Learner, District Attorney, for State

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd of August 2018 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 3rd of August 2018."
